Fahira Idris Polisikan Ade Armando soal Meme Anies Berwajah Joker
01 Nov 2019, 20:17 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Anggota Dewan Perwakilan Daerah (DPD) dari DKI Jakarta Fahira Idris melaporkan Ade Armando ke Polda Metro Jaya. Ade dilaporkan karena mem-posting meme berupa foto Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan dengan riasan wajah tokoh fiksi Joker ke Facebook.
"Saya hari ini ke Polda Metro Jaya untuk melaporkan Saudara Ade Armando karena saya tadi pagi jam 11.00 WIB di kantor saya di DPD RI di Senayan saya sangat-sangat terkejut dan merasa tersinggung ya sebagai warga DKI Jakarta dan ternyata memang banyak sekali yang tersinggung," kata Fahira di Polda Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Fahira merasa tersinggung karena foto Gubernur DKI Jakarta diedit dengan riasan Joker dan disebarkan di media sosial. Ada pula narasi-narasi yang mengandung ujaran kebencian dalam posting-an Ade Armando itu.
"Ini bisa dilihat ada di FB Ade Armando, ini adalah Gubernur DKI Jakarta yang sedang memakai busana resminya dia, pelantikannya dia dan ini milik Pemprov, milik publik, diubah seperti Joker dengan kata-kata atau narasi yang mengarah pada pencemaran nama baik," kata Fahira.
"Di sini disebutkan 'Gubernur jahat berawal dari menteri yang dipecat'. Jadi menurut saya apa yang dilakukan Saudara Ade Armando harus diusut oleh pihak berwenang," sambungnya.

Fahira Idris Polisikan Ade Armando about the Joker Faced Meme Anies
Nov 01 2019, 20:17 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Regional Representative Council (DPD) member from DKI Jakarta Fahira Idris reported Ade Armando to the Jakarta Police. Ade was reported for posting a meme in the form of a photo of DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan with a Joker fictional makeup on Facebook.
"I went to the Jakarta Police today to report Brother Ade Armando because I was 11.00 WIB at my office in the DPD RI in Senayan. I was very surprised and felt offended as a resident of DKI Jakarta and apparently there were many who were offended," Fahira said at the Jakarta Metropolitan Police, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
Fahira was offended because the photo of the Governor of DKI Jakarta was edited with Joker makeup and distributed on social media. There are also narratives that contain hate speech in Ade Armando's post.
"This can be seen in FB Ade Armando, this is the Governor of DKI Jakarta who is wearing his official attire, his inauguration and this belongs to the Provincial Government, public property, amended like a Joker with words or narration that leads to defamation," said Fahira.
"It says here that the 'evil governor started as a sacked minister.' So in my opinion, what Brother Ade Armando has done should be investigated by the authorities," he continued.
